pkgmetadata.longdescription: Projection Predictive Feature Selection // Performs projection predictive feature selection for generalized linear models (see, e.g., Piironen and Vehtari, 2017, doi:10.1007/s11222-016-9649-y). The package is compatible with 'rstanarm' package, but other reference models can also be used. See the package vignette for more information and examples.
